verses.text:
I'LL try to prove faithful,
I'll try to prove faithful,
I'll try to prove faithful, faithful, faithful,
Till we all shall meet above.

We mean to be faithful, &c.
Till we all shall meet above.

There'll be no more sinning, &c.
When we all shall meet above.

There'll be no more sorrow, &c.
When we all shall meet above.

Then we shall see Jesus, &c.
When we all shall meet above.

There we shall sing praises, &c.
When we all shall meet above.
